metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17450 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: find_abstract_instance in dwarf2.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite recursion and application crash) via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.34-5ubuntu1').
